app.title: Supplementary Materials
app.p: The following are available online at https://www.mdpi.com/article/10.3390/ma14123259/s1, Figure S1: 1H NMR for (BMIM)(Cl), Figure S2: 13C NMR for (BMIM)(Cl), Figure S3: 1H NMR for (BMIM)(HQS), Figure S4: 13C NMR for (BMIM)(HQS), Figure S5: CV of the pure (BMIM)(HQS) over the temperature range RT—70 °C. The scan rate is 10 mV/s, the working electrode is a 300 µm thickness JNTG carbon paper, Figure S6: MS spectrum of (BMIM)(Cl) in positive mode, Figure S7: MS spectrum of (BMIM)(HQS) in positive mode, Figure S8: MS spectrum of (BMIM)(HQS) in negative mode.
